summary: Replace the Ancient Shrouded Armor Skin with the Forsworn
descriptionHtml:
[size=20][color=red]discontinued[/size][/color] i stopped modding years ago i just dont have the time anymore sorry

This mod replaces the Ancient Shrouded Armor meshes with that of the Forsworn Armor it was a Request and i decided to release it

I'm still new to the modding scene so if you find any problems please let me know

Installation:
Unzip into Data folder. Activate "DB_to_Forsworn.esp" in your launcher.

Uninstall:
Delete "DB_to_Forsworn.esp" and "meshesarmordbarmor"

Check out my other Mods :
[URL=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=1021]Dragonplate and Draconscale to Nightingale[/url]
[URL=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=1127]Dragonscale Helmet to Dragonbone Helmet[/url]
author: Sordac
